content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Activity Monitoring events For general best practices related to events, see Events in Server & Workload Protection. To see the Activity Monitoring events captured by Server & Workload Protection, go to Events & Reports → Events → Activity Monitoring Events.
